Design Considerations and Performance
>
Key Performance Parameters
>• Responsivity (A/W): Photocurrent per unit optical power >• Dark Current: Leakage current without illumination >• Noise Equivalent Power (NEP): Minimum detectable power >• Bandwidth: Speed of response to modulated light >• Quantum Efficiency: Electron-hole pairs per photon
> R = ηq/hν = ηλ/1.24 >NEP = √(2qIdΔf)/R >BW ≈ 1/(2πRC) >η = Absorbed photons/Incident photons >
Circuit Design Considerations
>• Reverse bias increases depletion width and speed >• Load resistance affects bandwidth: BW ∝ 1/RL >• Shielding required to prevent electrical interference >• Temperature compensation for dark current drift >• Optical filters for wavelength selectivity
> Speed ↔ Sensitivity >Gain ↔ Noise >Area ↔ Capacitance >Bandwidth ↔ SNR >
